name: soul_collector
description:
the first game I made.
to play the game you need to collect the souls by clicking on them,

first, you will be able to click only on the blue and purple souls.

second, use the store at the top right corner to get power-ups and get souls much faster. 

your goal is to buy the last item in the store as fast as possible

good luck!

music by:
Matthew Pablo
Eric Matyas
